divs: Sighting Details3 fireball type objects... looked like a plane approaching at first as lights were close and in a line, then balls split up, started circling, making abstract movements, sometimes seemed to fizzle out and then light up again...
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There was one other sighting in Cincinnati on or around September 28th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
